patthana18.23:4.1: Upādānaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.23:4.3: Hetuyā cattāri … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana18.23:5.1: Kilesaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.23:5.3: Hetuyā cattāri … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
